input.sentences: a group of friends threw a party for the lady .
she was so excited to be there .
they made a delicious fruit cake for her .
after the cake they said a few kind words about her .
at the end everyone wished her well .
output.sentences: The lady threw a party for the neighborhood.
They were excited to spend time together.
Someone made a delicious fruit cake made with strawberries.
The group played a game that had to have the cake word in it.
They all wished each other well as they left the party.
